text: The water level in Mettur Dam stood at 70.03 feet on Sunday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage level stood at 32.726 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The inflow into the dam was 180 cusecs and about 2,000 cusecs of water is being discharged for farm activities in Delta districts.
title: Water level in Mettur Dam
